first_translate: fiona, are you there?
siegren?!
I didn’t expect you’d come so soon...

hangle: 좋아. 쇠뿔도 단김에 빼는 거다, 피오나.
first_translate: but that’s fine. let's get this over with once and for all, fiona.
let me reject him right away!

hangle: 시그렌의 호감은 그냥 각인 효과 같은 걸 거야.
first_translate: his affection toward me must just be some sort of imprinting effect.

hangle: 어린 시절, 낯선 여자애에게 처음으로 받은 호의에 설렌 거겠지.
first_translate: it was probably because I was his first love when he was young.

hangle: 솔직히 내가 시그렌 앞에서 얼마나 많이 추태를 부렸는데.
first_translate: to be honest, I’ve acted like such a fool around him countless times before.
the power of nostalgia is truly scary...
come on in.
good morning...
what brings you here today?
stay calm... stay calm...
d-did you lock the door?
yep.
don’t misunderstand.

hangle: 아벨이 와서 대화를 방해할까 봐 그런 거니까.
first_translate: I did it so we wouldn’t be interrupted by abel if he comes back.
o-oh, okay then...

hangle: 그래도 정 불안하면 그냥 여기 있을게.
first_translate: if you’re still uncomfortable, I can stand near the door--
no need to do that.
this is siegren we’re talking about.

hangle: 새삼스럽게 고백 하나 받았다고 낯선 사람으로 여길 필요는 없는데.
first_translate: there’s no reason why I have to treat him as a stranger after hearing what he said yesterday.
fiona.

hangle: 그렇게 멀찍이 서 있으면 대화하기 힘든데.
first_translate: can you please not stand so far from me? it makes our conversation difficult.
okay...
siegren.
I wanted to talk to you about your confession yesterday.
is there something about me that bothers you?
pardon?
uh... well, uh...
do you dislike anything about me?
well...
I don’t know! nothing really comes to mind!
my face maybe?

hangle: …어릴 적부터 내 얼굴이 가장 마음에 든다며?
first_translate: b-but you always told me how much you liked my looks since childhood...
th-then perhaps my personality?
even though I’m saying this myself, it sounds ridiculous...
I also think highly of my own character.

hangle: 성격의 어느 부분이 마음에 안 드는데?
first_translate: then which part of my personality displeases you?
wait, will you change yourself according to whatever I say?
of course.
wow, he’s dead serious.
not only does he look good, but he’s talented too.

hangle: 심지어 나한테 전부 맞춰 주겠다는 황자님이라니.
first_translate: and now he says he’ll become whoever I want him to be.
this definitely feels like a novel.

hangle: 현실에 이런 남자가 있을 리 없지.
first_translate: a man like him doesn’t exist in real life.
monologue

hangle: 예전부터 좋아하는 상대가 생기면 잘해 줘야 된다고 신신당부를 했었지.
first_translate: that’s right. whenever someone you liked came along, you would tell them they had to treat their partner nicely.
r-right...
indeed. many times.

hangle: 네가 말한 것들 다 기억하고 있어.
first_translate: I remember everything you ever told me.
as I mentioned earlier,

hangle: 넌 가끔 나를 생각한다고 이상한 쪽으로 생각이 튄다고.
first_translate: whenever you thought of me, strange thoughts crossed your mind.

hangle: 하지만 이번에도 나를 위한다며 어물쩍하게 물러날 생각이라면.
first_translate: but if you plan on turning down my feelings again under the pretense of doing it “for my sake,”
know that I won’t give up easily either.
all I wished for...
...was for siegren to be happy.

hangle: 내가 아는 시그렌의 가장 큰 행복은
first_translate: from what I knew, the greatest happiness for siegren...
...would be falling in love with eunice, just like in the original story.

hangle: 하지만 이렇게 된 이상 완벽하게 원작대로 흘러가지는 않을 테지.
first_translate: but things aren’t going exactly as planned anymore.

hangle: 지금 알 수 있는 건 그것뿐이다.
first_translate: for now, that’s all I know.
has your personality been like this all along?

hangle: 그거야 넌 늘 나에 대해 잘 알고 있다고 생각하고 있으니까.
first_translate: you always believed you understood me better than anyone else.

hangle: 그게 얼마나 큰 실책인지 곧 깨닫게 될 거야.
first_translate: but you'll realize very soon how wrong you were.
his hands feel big and thick.
his hands feel big and thick.
truthfully, I find myself softening at siegren’s words.

hangle: 정떨어질 정도로 차갑게 고백을 거절할 자신이 없다.
first_translate: I couldn’t possibly turn him down coldly enough to make him hate me.
if I accept him, we’ll end up becoming lovers next.
a romantic relationship.

hangle: 세상에 남녀 사이만큼 깊어 보이면서도 얄팍한 관계가 또 어디 있나.
first_translate: where else could one find a bond as deep yet shallow as romance?

hangle: 사실 시그렌과 유니스의 사이도 내가 쓴 소설 속이니 ‘운명적 사랑’ 운운하는 거지,
first_translate: even the relationship between siegren and eunice was described as "fated" simply because it happened within the context of a fictional novel.
but in reality, it wasn’t meant to last long.
normally speaking,

hangle: 본래라면 그런 로맨스 따위 믿지 않는다.
first_translate: I never believed in those kinds of romances.
when considering reality,

hangle: 내가 시그렌과 연인 사이가 된다고 해도 결국 나중에 깨질 거다.
first_translate: even if siegren and I became lovers, our relationship would eventually fall apart someday.

hangle: 그러니 시그렌이 나에 대한 애정이 식을 때,
first_translate: so when siegren loses interest in me,
I’ll just break off ties cleanly.
first loves,
confessions,
and young couples.

hangle: 지금은 모든 게 밤하늘의 별처럼 아름답게 반짝여도,
first_translate: right now, everything may seem beautiful like stars shining brightly across the night sky,

hangle: 끝내 바위에 부딪히는 파도의 포말처럼 흩어지겠지.
first_translate: but ultimately, it will scatter into foam like waves crashing against rocks.

hangle: 타오르는 그의 열정도 언젠가 식어 버릴 거다.
first_translate: his burning passion will fade out sooner or later.
thus,
if I cannot bring myself to refuse him,

hangle: 지금은 시그렌이 원하는 대로 해도 되지 않을까.
first_translate: maybe I can go along with what siegren wants for now.

hangle: 크게 문제 되는 건 아무것도 없을지도 몰라.
first_translate: nothing bad might happen anyway.
alright, siegren.
about what?
fi--
fiona?
you said you wanted us to try lots of new things together.
is this what you had in mind?
by that,
I mean...
...I accept your confession.
